FAQs

How long does shipping take?

We offer **free standard shipping** on all orders!

Most orders arrive in **1‚Äì3 business days**.

In rare cases, due to high demand or low stock, delivery may take **7‚Äì12 days**.

You'll receive a tracking number as soon as your order ships so you can follow it every step of the way.

30 Day Money Back Guarantee

Yes! We‚Äôve got a **30-day risk-free trial**.

If you're not completely satisfied, simply return the product within 30 days of receiving it for a **full refund** ‚Äî no questions asked.

Is it suitable for my car?

Absolutely!

Our LED light kit is **universally compatible** with most vehicles ‚Äî including cars, trucks, SUVs, and more.

As long as your vehicle has a **12V cigarette lighter port**, you‚Äôre good to glow. ‚ú®

Disclaimer



This LED car lighting kit is intended for **interior use only** and should be installed in accordance with the included instructions.

Please ensure the lights do not obstruct driving visibility or interfere with vehicle operation.

Product is **compatible with most 12V vehicle power outlets**, but may not be suitable for all makes and models. Check your vehicle‚Äôs specifications before installation.

We are not responsible for any damage caused by incorrect installation, misuse, or modification of the product.

Use responsibly and in compliance with **local laws and regulations** regarding in-vehicle lighting.  
Some regions may restrict the use of certain lighting effects while driving.

Thanks for contacting us. We'll get back to you as soon as possible.
